subject: How to build multiple junit test cases by using single junit test class
msgSnippet: I built a junit test class, and want to build multiple test cases using this class by passing different jvmargs(running junit test cases with ant). Can anyone
messageBody:
I built a junit test class, and want to build multiple test cases
using this class by passing different jvmargs(running junit test
cases with ant). Can anyone tell me how
to do this?
Thanks!
